settings.item_heading: When Will My Order Be Shipped?
settings.text: Our team needs 1-2 business days to pack and ship your full order. For larger items, we ask that you allow 3-4 business days. Orders placed after 1:00 pm EST on Friday — or over the weekend — will ship on the next business day.
We ship worldwide. Please note international delivery times will vary depending on location and may attract import costs if outside the USA.

settings.item_heading: I Have a Question About My Order, Who I Can Talk To?
settings.text: Please use the contact form on the Contact Us page to send us your queries.

settings.item_heading: How Are the Product Materials Sourced?
settings.text: We source all our product materials ethically and in an environment-friendly manner. Most of the items are sourced locally to help other small businesses and support local artists.

settings.item_heading: How Accurate Are the Colors Shown in Your Photos?
settings.text: The colors shown in our product photos on the product detail pages are highly accurate. But please note that there are small variations in lot-batches of a few products due to which the colors will have slight variations.
Please refer to the Returns & Exchanges page for our return policy.

settings.item_heading: My Item Arrived Damaged. What Should I Do?
settings.text: We take the utmost care in our packaging and delivery and rarely items may be damaged in transit. If your item does arrive damaged, let us know by sending us a message via our contact page.

settings.item_heading: Do You Offer Cash on Delivery?
settings.text: Unfortunately, we don’t offer cash on delivery. But we have a lot of options that allow flexible payments and vouchsafe your money in case you need to initiate a return due to product faults.

settings.item_heading: Can I Use Afterpay for Products that Will ship to California?
settings.text: Yes! We’ve partnered with Afterpay to provide flexi-payment for customers all over the globe.
